014package org.microbean.bean;
015
016/**
017 * A {@link Cloneable} reigstry of {@link AutoCloseable} instances that itself is {@link AutoCloseable}.
018 *
019 * <p>{@linkplain #close() Closing} an {@link AutoCloseableRegistry} {@linkplain AutoCloseable#close() closes} its
020 * registrants.</p>
021 *
022 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson/" target="_top">Laird Nelson</a>
023 *
024 * @see #register(AutoCloseable)
025 */
026public interface AutoCloseableRegistry extends AutoCloseable, Cloneable {
027
028  /**
029   * Returns a new {@link AutoCloseableRegistry} instance that is not {@linkplain #closed() closed} and has no
030   * {@linkplain #register(AutoCloseable)} registrations.
031   *
032   * <p>The new instance will be {@linkplain #register(AutoCloseable) registered} with this {@link
033   * AutoCloseableRegistry} if this {@link AutoCloseableRegistry} is not {@linkplain #closed() closed}.</p>
034   *
035   * @return a new {@link AutoCloseableRegistry}
036   *
037   * @nullability Implementations of this method must not return {@code null}.
038   *
039   * @idempotency All invocations of implementations of this method must return new, distinct {@link AutoCloseable}
040   * instances.
041   *
042   * @threadsafety Implementations of this method must be safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
043   *
044   * @see Cloneable
045   *
046   * @see #closed()
047   *
048   * @see #register(AutoCloseable)
049   */
050  public AutoCloseableRegistry clone();
051
052  /**
053   * Closes this {@link AutoCloseableRegistry} and {@linkplain AutoCloseable#close() closes} its {@linkplain
054   * #register(AutoCloseable) registrants}.
055   *
056   * @idempotency Implementations of this method must be idempotent.
057   *
058   * @threadsafety Implementations of this method must be safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
059   */
060  @Override // AutoCloseable
061  public void close();
062
063  /**
064   * Returns {@code true} if and only if this {@link AutoCloseableRegistry} has been {@linkplain #close() closed}.
065   *
066   * @return {@code true} if and only if this {@link AutoCloseableRegistry} has been {@linkplain #close() closed}
067   *
068   * @idempotency Implementations of this method must be idempotent.
069   *
070   * @threadsafety Implementations of this method must be safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
071   */
072  public boolean closed();
073
074  /**
075   * If this {@link AutoCloseableRegistry} is not {@linkplain #closed() closed}, and if the supplied {@link
076   * AutoCloseable} has not yet been registered, registers it such that it will be {@linkplain AutoCloseable#close()
077   * closed} when this {@link AutoCloseableRegistry} is {@linkplain #close() closed}, and returns {@code true}.
078   *
079   * <p>This method takes no action and returns {@code false} in all other cases.</p>
080   *
081   * @param c the {@link AutoCloseable} to register; must not be {@code null}
082   *
083   * @return {@code true} if and only if this {@link AutoCloseableRegistry} is not {@linkplain #closed() closed} and the
084   * supplied {@link AutoCloseable} is not already registered and registration completed successfully; {@code false} in
085   * all other cases
086   *
087   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code c} is {@code null}
088   */
089  public boolean register(final AutoCloseable c);
090
091}
